column4: hey everyone..... i was wondering if i should change the version firefox i have from the built in one to the official one from the firefox site... i've been experiencing a lot of system freezing from using it
any ideas on that? or should i just go with using konquerer
Konqueror, Seamonkey,  Galeon, and Epiphany all good
ok thanks.. i'll stick with konqueror for now and see if i notice the difference
